item.title: Ravens, Broncos, 49ers, Seahawks Lead Way With 6 Players at NFL Pro Bowl Games
item.description: Six Baltimore Ravens, Denver Broncos, San Francisco 49ers and Seattle Seahawks were selected for the NFL Pro Bowl Games.

item.title: 'Way We Do Playoffs is Messed Up': Oregon Ducks HC Dan Lanning Slams CFP Format
item.description: Oregon head coach Dan Lanning criticized the CFP neutral site format, as the Ducks prepare for Big 12-champion Texas Tech.

item.title: 2025 College Football Bowl Game Odds: Lines, Spreads for Every Game
item.description: College football bowl season is here, so it's time to dive into the odds for every matchup. Here are the latest lines.

item.title: Kansas Jayhawks HC Bill Self: Darryn Peterson Family Playing Role in His Return
item.description: As Kansas freshman Darryn Peterson is sidelined with a quad injury, Bill Self explained the role the guard's family is playing.
